short_summary: Asphlt boiler aquisition and training in Havre-aux-Maisons, Quebec
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of an asphalt boiler including delivery and training in Havre-aux-Maisons, Quebec, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirements.
full_summary:
**Tender Title**
# T3033-2524X9 Asphalt Boiler Procurement

## Procurement Overview

## Goods and Services Description
